Package com.moovie.network

Interface WMService

public interface WMService
Interface for the WatchMode API service.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    retrofit2.Call<TitleSourcesResponse>
    getTitleSources(String titleId, String apiKey)
    Gets the streaming sources for a specific title.
    retrofit2.Call<WatchResponse>
    searchByTmdbId(String apiKey, String searchField, String searchValue, String types)
    Searches for a title by TMDB ID.

  • Method Details

    • searchByTmdbId

      @GET("search/") retrofit2.Call<WatchResponse> searchByTmdbId(@Query("apiKey") String apiKey, @Query("search_field") String searchField, @Query("search_value") String searchValue, @Query("types") String types)
      Searches for a title by TMDB ID.
      Parameters:
      apiKey - The WatchMode API key.
      searchField - The field to search by (e.g., "tmdb_id").
      searchValue - The value to search for.
      types - The types of titles to search for.
      Returns:
      A call to execute the request.

    • getTitleSources

      @GET("title/{title_id}/sources/") retrofit2.Call<TitleSourcesResponse> getTitleSources(@Path("title_id") String titleId, @Query("apiKey") String apiKey)
      Gets the streaming sources for a specific title.
      Parameters:
      titleId - The WatchMode title ID.
      apiKey - The WatchMode API key.
      Returns:
      A call to execute the request.
